body_html: @soumith yeah this is because we didn't have enough amd CI machines until this week, so the tests were disabled in PR before (it was only running build). I think disabling the tests in rocm (there is @skipIfRocm decorator) would be a quick way to make the CI back to normal. In the meanwhile, @iotamudelta could you help investigating the issue?

body: @soumith yeah this is because we didn't have enough amd CI machines until this week, so the tests were disabled in PR before (it was only running build). I think disabling the tests in rocm (there is @skipIfRocm decorator) would be a quick way to make the CI back to normal. In the meanwhile, @iotamudelta could you help investigating the issue?
